select product.id productId, detail.id detailId, wmove.id parentId, round(ifnull(detail.count,0),2) taskCount, product.name productName, product.code productCode, product.spec spec, genre.name genreName, unit.name unitName, wproduct.code pathCode, oldwarehouse.id originWarehouseId, oldwarehouse.path_name originPath, newwarehouse.id targetWarehouseId, newwarehouse.path_name targetPath, detail.warehouse_product_id warehouseProductId,
round(ifnull(moveDtlExecute.executeCount,0),2) completeCount, round((ifnull(detail.count,0) - ifnull(moveDtlExecute.executeCount,0)), 2) unCompleteCount
from vmes_warehouse_move_detail detail left join vmes_warehouse_move wmove on wmove.id = detail.parent_id left join vmes_warehouse_product wproduct on detail.warehouse_product_id = wproduct.id left join vmes_warehouse oldwarehouse on oldwarehouse.id = wproduct.warehouse_id left join vmes_warehouse newwarehouse on newwarehouse.id = wmove.warehouse_id left join vmes_product product on wproduct.product_id = product.id left join vmes_product_unit produnit on produnit.product_id = product .id and produnit.type = 1 left join vmes_dictionary unit on produnit.unit = unit.id left join vmes_dictionary genre on product.genre = genre.id
left join ( select detail_id, sum(count) executeCount from vmes_warehouse_move_execute group by detail_id ) moveDtlExecute on detail.id = moveDtlExecute.detail_id
and detail.id = #{detailId}
